meanings.definition: The side of a right triangle opposite the right angle.
meanings.sent1: In a right triangle, the hypotenuse is always opposite the right angle.
meanings.sent2: To find the length of the hypotenuse, you can use the Pythagorean theorem.
meanings.sent3: The hypotenuse of the triangle decided to take a break and relax in the shade.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the hypotenuse of a triangle, stretching from one end to the other.
meanings.sent5: The hypotenuse, like a bridge between the other two sides, completes the triangle.

meanings.definition: The longest side of a right triangle, which is opposite the right angle.
meanings.sent1: When building a roof, it's important to measure the hypotenuse accurately.
meanings.sent2: The hypotenuse is always the side opposite the right angle in a right triangle.
meanings.sent3: The hypotenuse of the triangle was feeling quite proud of being the longest side.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the hypotenuse that connected his dreams to reality.
meanings.sent5: The hypotenuse, stretching across the triangle, is like the backbone of the shape.
